trends: There have been no other sightings in Linganore-Bartonsville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson given night my wife age 36and 2 daughters ages 9&11 saw a randomly pulsating\flashing light reddish\orange in color hovering. i turned around at the next street approximately 100 yards from where they saw it and i as well saw it briefly but it was moving and disappeared rapidly. we turned around and started heading back in the direction we were heading and as we got to the intersection of ijamsville rd and rt 144 i looked back and it was there again. i pulled to the side of the rd and while we were all watching it i called my mom (i am 36) we spoke for about 10 seconds and the phone beeped and went to the unlock screen (motorola atrix 2on the at&t network). signal strength was full on mine and my wife's phones. we called her back and the phone worked fine and i explained to he'd what we were seeing. the object appeared identical and did pretty much the same thing that it did the first time. 20 mins were about all it was for the whole incident. there is no reporting of it and no aircraft were seen in the area.
Summary: Flashing pulsating light that hovered for approximately 45 seconds then started moving and disappeared rapidly.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
